name: dprint-mono-repo
description: A plugable and configurable code formatter.

scripts.build-website: rimraf build-website && npm run --prefix playground build && mkdir -p "build-website/playground" && copyfiles -u 2 "playground/build/**/*.*" "build-website/playground" && copyfiles -u 1 "website/**/*.*" "build-website"

author: David Sherret
